ygData.messageBody:
To be honest having a good 1H would be pretty nice.
Make fighting those wizzies/mages/enchanters a little
easier.
And as for your weight issue, get yourself a Box of
Abu Kar. That 1 item has made me VERY happy. Then you
can carry around 10 weapons of your choosing with no
worries about weight.

I got mine from a specter. I have heard you can also
get them from Gnome guards, Lizardman Heretics and
Justicars.

What i feel we need though is a REALLY good Scythe
weapon. That one from Grimrot stinks. Not that i would
kill him for it anyway. A Scythe, i think it would
give us a truely menacing look.


Bathory D'Allatu
Minins of Darkness
Cazic-Thule


>
> A new 1HS weapon, just wonderful. As if carrying
> around the Dark Reaver and
> Fleshripper weren't enough, now you want the SMALL
> guys to lug around a 1H
> sword AND a shield too. Yay. My Str is only 97, and
> even with an EE Bag,
> that stuff is still heavy. Not to mention a whole
> 'nother skill to keep up
> with, ugh.
>
> Better options:
> 1.) Give us kick. Humans and Dark Elves will use it,
> large races won't
> (because they have slam). Also fits into the image
> of SKs being mean,
> under-handed, intense damage-dealing tanks.
> 2.) Give us spells (like Banshee Aura) that are
> human/de only. Larges can
> outsource to druids/mages for their damshields.
> 3.) Make some new human/de only items (not
> necessarily weapons). The easiest
> way to do this is just make some new SK armor that
> is medium-sized, the
> larges just can't wear em, but the human/de SKs can.
>
> Dravith Vandre'i
